metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000188 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
nodejs ejs version older than 2.5.5 is vulnerable to a Cross-site-scriptingin the ejs.renderFile() resulting in code injection

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000188` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-ejs - 2.5.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-ejs package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.7-1').
